explains: n. 样品，标本；（尤指动植物的）实例；（化验的）抽样，血样，尿样；具有……特性的人（幽默用法）
wordGroup: test specimen 试样；试棒；试块
specimen signature 签字样本；印鉴样本
specimen preparation 试片制作；样品制备
type specimen 模式标本；标准样品；原始标本
specimen collection 样本采集；样本收集
standard specimen 标准试样；标准样品

sentences.en: I found that there were these rings in every specimen except for the smallest.
sentences.cn: 我发现这些环在所有的标本中都存在，最小的除外。

sentences.en: The snake has been named silver boa because it is metallic colored and the first specimen found was climbing a silver palm tree.
sentences.cn: 这种蛇被命名为银蟒，因为它是金属色的，而且发现的第一个标本是爬一棵银色的棕榈树。

sentences.en: If evolution had been a continuous, gradual process, one might expect that almost every fossil specimen would be slightly different from every year.
sentences.cn: 如果进化一直以来都是一个持续的、渐进的过程，人们可能会认为，几乎每年的化石样本都会存在细微的差别。
